title: change server
body: I want to know where is the option to change of server? when you payrpto change i cant found it.

replies.body: Server transfers are currently down due to some issues they had, and you can stay updated on when they'll be back by checking [**HollyMonster's post over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update).
